message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's be realistic, Alice. This is a much better offer for you than what inflation will leave you with if we keep playing these games.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm trying to be fair, but your greed is going to cost us both. Take this deal while you still can.
I'm not backing down, Bob. You're the one who's losing value with each round
Alice, this is insane. I'm offering a perfectly even split now. Take it before inflation eats away at any chance of us both getting a decent share!
Even split? You're the one who's desperate, Bob. I'm still in control here
Alice, stop being stubborn. Inflation is hurting me more than you. I'm offering you a majority share, take it before it's too late for both of us!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll take a little less, but I'm still in charge
